resources.string: The revolutionary upgrades in IoT and the immense love towards losing cables in our recent technological trends has led to a massive outburst in the number of wireless devices we use. Sometimes, we know that it gets a little overwhelming for everyone. Don\'t worry though, we\'ve got you. BlueRadar is a unified system that can manage, track and locate all the devices that you\'ve paired with your Android smartphone.
Avid PC Building enthusiast, gamer and always on the latest version of Ubuntu. Considers Java as the almighty programming language and reccommends it for everyone\'s use for everything.
Third year SFU Software Systems student with a strong passion in Android development and aspire to become a full stack software developer at a company in the leagues of FAANG.

Jobless software developer looking for job opportunities. Fourth year SFU CS student with some experience in Java, Kotlin, C++, and K-Pop. Considers cryptocurrency mining is more important than gaming with GPUs.

Interests in weird things and avid procrastinator. I will probably work on anything but don\'t expect it to look nice. Does not understand why NFT\'s work, why people like them, and wants to sell stupid ones to people.
